com.bill.java.api

Class Services

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.bill.java.api.net.ApiResource
      • com.bill.java.api.Services

  • public class Services
extends ApiResource
    Contains resources for accessing Bill.com services

    • Method Detail

      • chargeCustomer

        public static ReceivedPay chargeCustomer(ChargeCustomerRequestParams chargeCustomerRequestParams)
                                  throws java.io.IOException,
                                         BDCException
        This processes a receipt from a customer to withdraw funds from the authorized CustomerBankAccount.

        NOTE: Direct bank charges to customer's bank requires customer's authorization.

        Parameters:
        chargeCustomerRequestParams - data required to make the request
        Returns:
        a ReceivedPay record
        Throws:
        BDCException - when the response from the API is unsuccessful
        java.io.IOException - when an I/O exception occurs on the underlying request

      • getAccountsReceivableSummary

        public static AccountsReceivableSummary getAccountsReceivableSummary()
                                                              throws java.io.IOException,
                                                                     BDCException
        This returns a summary of accounts receivable invoices and received payments. Use this as a review of current outstanding receivables and received payments.
        Returns:
        an AccountsReceivableSummary object
        Throws:
        BDCException - when the response from the API is unsuccessful
        java.io.IOException - when an I/O exception occurs on the underlying request

      • recordARPayment

        public static ReceivedPay recordARPayment(RecordARPaymentRequestParams recordARPaymentRequestParams)
                                   throws java.io.IOException,
                                          BDCException
        Use this API to record payments from a Customer made outside of Bill.com.

        Parameters:
        recordARPaymentRequestParams - data required to make the request
        Returns:
        a SentPay record
        Throws:
        BDCException - when the response from the API is unsuccessful
        java.io.IOException - when an I/O exception occurs on the underlying request

      • payBills

        public static java.util.List<SentPay> payBills(PayBillsRequestParams payBillsRequestParams)
                                        throws java.io.IOException,
                                               BDCException
        Use this API to issue Bill.com payments (one or more bills and one or more bill credits) to a designated vendor. These are paid from a specified bank account.

        The user that uses this API MUST be verified ("pay bills" function enabled in the assigned user role - Administrator, Payer, customized). If not, an error is returned.

        Parameters:
        payBillsRequestParams - data required to make the request
        Returns:
        a list of SentPay records
        Throws:
        BDCException - when the response from the API is unsuccessful
        java.io.IOException - when an I/O exception occurs on the underlying request

      • recordAPPayment

        public static SentPay recordAPPayment(RecordAPPaymentRequestParams recordAPPaymentRequestParams)
                               throws java.io.IOException,
                                      BDCException
        Use this API to issue Bill.com payments (one or more bills and one or more bill credits) to a designated vendor. These are paid from a specified bank account.

        The user that uses this API MUST be verified ("pay bills" function enabled in the assigned user role - Administrator, Payer, customized). If not, an error is returned.

        Parameters:
        recordAPPaymentRequestParams - data required to make the request
        Returns:
        a SentPay record
        Throws:
        BDCException - when the response from the API is unsuccessful
        java.io.IOException - when an I/O exception occurs on the underlying request

      • getAccountsPayableSummary

        public static AccountsPayableSummary getAccountsPayableSummary()
                                                        throws java.io.IOException,
                                                               BDCException
        This returns a summary of all Accounts Payable bills and approvals for your Bill.com account.
        Returns:
        an AccountsPayableSummary object
        Throws:
        BDCException - when the response from the API is unsuccessful
        java.io.IOException - when an I/O exception occurs on the underlying request

      • getDisbursementData

        public static DisbursementData getDisbursementData(GetDisbursementDataRequestParams getDisbursementDataRequestParams)
                                            throws java.io.IOException,
                                                   BDCException
        This request provides payment and applied vendor credit details for any SentPay issued via PayBills request to a vendor. The parameter disbursementStatus is empty until MoneyMovement for the SentPay is debited to be paid to the vendor

        Response depends on how payment was sent to vendor: check, ePayment via ACH, ePayment to Large Billers, or via PayPal.

        Parameters:
        getDisbursementDataRequestParams - data required to make the request
        Returns:
        data about the status of outgoing payments
        Throws:
        BDCException - when the response from the API is unsuccessful
        java.io.IOException - when an I/O exception occurs on the underlying request

      • listPayments

        public static java.util.List<SentPay> listPayments(ListPaymentsRequestParams listPaymentsRequestParams)
                                            throws java.io.IOException,
                                                   BDCException
        This returns list of payments based on a SentPay's specified disbursementStatus value.
        Parameters:
        listPaymentsRequestParams - data required to make the request
        Returns:
        List of sentPays with a disbursement status specified in the params
        Throws:
        BDCException - when the response from the API is unsuccessful
        java.io.IOException - when an I/O exception occurs on the underlying request
